archiefmat.titel: Archief van de Synode en de Algemene Synodale Commissie van de Nederlandse Hervormde Kerk
archiefmat.titel_eng: Archive of the Synod and the General Synodal Committee of the Dutch Reformed Church
archiefmat.notes: The Proceedings (Handelingen) and the appendices to the Proceedings are relevant and have been published. Nos. 195-233 are the printed Proceedings, years 1816-1870. See in particular appendix D (for example nos. 392-401, years 1861-1870). There are also printed registers of the Proceedings (nos. 476-480, years 1816-1827, 1816-1840, 1841-1850, 1851-1860, 1861-1870; topic "Gemeenten in Neêrlands(ch) Indien" or "Protestantsche kerken in Neêrlands-Indien".
archiefmat.Aantekeningen: Kopie van de inventaris op de Q\schijf.
